While we're on the Voluis subject:

1. Controlling Soundwave is moding, since he's not your character, minime. 
Meaning you'd have to wait for him to build and get into the machine.
2. Super-powerful characters are illegal in this RPG. Meaning the TM3 driver 
can power you up, but it cannot make you super-powerful.

::Mosquitor::

As the alarm sounds in the predacon base, Mosquitor flies into the room, gun 
ready.

"DIE INVADER!!!" He yells as he fires on Voluis.
